item.text: The Lord spoke to Moses at Mount Sinai:
“Speak to the Israelites and tell them, ‘When you enter the land that I am giving you, the land must observe a Sabbath to the Lord.

<st data-num="08337" class="">Six</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> you may <st data-num="02232" class="">sow</st> your <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st>, and <st data-num="08337" class="">six</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> you may <st data-num="02168" class="">prune</st> your <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyard</st> and <st data-num="0622" class="">gather</st> the <st data-num="08393" class="">produce</st>,<n id="1" />
but in the seventh year the land must have a Sabbath of complete rest—a Sabbath to the Lord. You must not sow your field or prune your vineyard.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07114" class="">gather in</st> the <st data-num="05599" class="">aftergrowth</st> of your <st data-num="07105" class="">harvest</st>, and you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01219" class="">pick</st> the <st data-num="06025" class="">grapes</st> of your <st data-num="05139" class="">unpruned vines</st>;<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> must <st data-num="01961" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> of <st data-num="07677" class="">complete rest</st>.

You may <st data-num="01961" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbath produce</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> to <st data-num="0402" class="">eat</st>—you, your <st data-num="05650" class="">male servant</st>, your <st data-num="0519" class="">female servant</st>, your <st data-num="07916" class="">hired worker</st>, the <st data-num="08453" class="">resident foreigner</st> who <st data-num="01481" class="">stays</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you,<n id="2" />
your cattle, and the wild animals that are in your land—all its produce will be for you to eat.
“‘You must count off seven weeks of years, seven times seven years, and the days of the seven weeks of years will amount to 49 years.

You must <st data-num="05674" class="">sound</st> <st data-num="08643" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="07782" class="">horn</st> <st data-num="08643" class="">blasts</st><n id="1" />—in the <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st>, on the <st data-num="06218" class="">tenth</st> day of the <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st>, on the <st data-num="03117" class="">Day</st> of <st data-num="03725" class="">Atonement</st>—you must <st data-num="05674" class="">sound</st> the <st data-num="07782" class="">horn</st> in your <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.

So you must <st data-num="06942" class="">consecrate</st> the <st data-num="02572" class="">fiftieth</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st>,<n id="1" /> and you must <st data-num="07121" class="">proclaim</st> a <st data-num="01865" class="">release</st><n id="2" /> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> for <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabitants</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">That year</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> your <st data-num="03104" class="">Jubilee</st>;<n id="3" /> <st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> one of you must <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="0272" class="">property</st>, and <st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> one of you must <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="04940" class="">clan</st>.

<st data-num="01931" class="">That</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">fiftieth</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> your <st data-num="03104" class="">Jubilee</st>; you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02232" class="">sow</st> the land, <st data-num="07114" class="">harvest</st> its <st data-num="05599" class="">aftergrowth</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="01219" class="">pick</st> the <st data-num="01219" class="">grapes</st> of its <st data-num="05139" class="">unpruned vines</st>.<n id="1" />
Because that year is a Jubilee, it will be holy to you—you may eat its produce from the field.
“‘In this Year of Jubilee you must each return to your property.

<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="04376" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="04465" class="">sale</st><n id="1" /> to your <st data-num="05997" class="">fellow citizen</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="07069" class="">buy</st><n id="3" /> from your <st data-num="03027 05997">fellow citizen</st>, <st data-num="0408" class="">no</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">one</st> is to <st data-num="03238" class="">wrong</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>.<n id="4" />

You may <st data-num="07069" class="">buy</st> it <st data-num="0854">from</st> your <st data-num="05997" class="">fellow citizen</st> according to the <st data-num="04557" class="">number</st> of <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">since</st><n id="1" /> the last <st data-num="03104" class="">Jubilee</st>; he may <st data-num="04376" class="">sell</st> it to you <st data-num="04557">according to</st> the <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> of <st data-num="08393" class="">produce</st> that are left.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="07230" class="">more</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="06310" class="">there are</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="07235" class="">more</st> you may <st data-num="07235" class="">make</st> its <st data-num="04736" class="">purchase price</st>, and the <st data-num="04591" class="">fewer</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="06310" class="">there are</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="04591" class="">less</st> you must <st data-num="04591" class="">make</st> its <st data-num="04736" class="">purchase price</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="01931" class="">is</st> only <st data-num="04376" class="">selling</st> to you a <st data-num="04557" class="">number</st> of years of<n id="3" /> <st data-num="08393" class="">produce</st>.
No one is to oppress his fellow citizen, but you must fear your God, because I am the Lord your God.
You must obey my statutes and my regulations; you must be sure to keep them so that you may live securely in the land.
“‘The land will give its fruit, and you may eat until you are satisfied, and you may live securely in the land.

<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> will we <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> in the <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> <st data-num="02005" class="">if</st> we do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02232" class="">sow</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">and</st> <st data-num="0622" class="">gather</st> our <st data-num="08393" class="">produce</st>?”

I will <st data-num="06680" class="">command</st> my <st data-num="01293" class="">blessing</st> for you in the <st data-num="08345" class="">sixth</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> so that it may <st data-num="06213" class="">yield</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="08393" class="">produce</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>,

and you may <st data-num="02232" class="">sow</st> the <st data-num="08066" class="">eighth</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> and <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> that sixth year’s <st data-num="08393" class="">produce</st><n id="1" />—<st data-num="03465" class="">old produce</st>. <st data-num="05704" class="">Until</st> you <st data-num="0935" class="">bring in</st> the <st data-num="08671" class="">ninth</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year’s</st> <st data-num="08393" class="">produce</st>,<n id="2" /> you may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="03465" class="">old produce</st>.

The <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="04376" class="">sold</st> <st data-num="06783" class="">without reclaim</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> belongs to me, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="01616" class="">foreign residents</st>, <st data-num="08453" class="">temporary settlers</st>, <st data-num="05978" class="">with</st> me.<n id="2" />
In all your landed property you must provide for the right of redemption of the land.
“‘If your brother becomes impoverished and sells some of his property, his near redeemer is to come to you and redeem what his brother sold.

<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">has</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="01350" class="">redeemer</st>, but <st data-num="03027" class="">he</st> <st data-num="05381" class="">prospers</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="04672" class="">gains</st> <st data-num="01767" class="">enough</st> for its <st data-num="01353" class="">redemption</st>,<n id="2" />

he is to <st data-num="02803" class="">calculate</st> the value of the <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> it was <st data-num="04465" class="">sold</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07725" class="">refund</st> the <st data-num="05736" class="">balance</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> to <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> he had <st data-num="04376" class="">sold</st> it, and <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st> to his <st data-num="0272" class="">property</st>.

If he has not prospered enough to refund a balance to him, then what he sold will belong to the one who bought it until the Jubilee year, but it must revert in the Jubilee and the original owner may return to his property.
“‘If a man sells a residential house in a walled city, its right of redemption must extend until one full year from its sale; its right of redemption must extend to a full calendar year.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> it is <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01350" class="">redeemed</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="08549" class="">full calendar</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> is <st data-num="04390" class="">ended</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> in the <st data-num="02346" class="">walled</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="06965" class="">belong</st> <st data-num="06783" class="">without reclaim</st><n id="3" /> to the one who <st data-num="07069" class="">bought</st> it throughout his <st data-num="01755" class="">generations</st>; it will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">revert</st> in the <st data-num="03104" class="">Jubilee</st>.

The <st data-num="01004" class="">houses</st> of <st data-num="02691" class="">villages</st>, however,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> <st data-num="0369">have no</st> <st data-num="02346" class="">wall</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st><n id="2" /> must be <st data-num="02803" class="">considered</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">as</st> the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>; they will <st data-num="01961" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="01353" class="">right of redemption</st> and must <st data-num="03318" class="">revert</st> in the <st data-num="03104" class="">Jubilee</st>.

As for<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> of the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st>, the <st data-num="01004" class="">houses</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> which they <st data-num="0272" class="">possess</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st> must <st data-num="01961" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="05769" class="">perpetual</st> <st data-num="01353" class="">right of redemption</st>.

<st data-num="0834" class="">Whatever</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">someone among</st> the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st> might <st data-num="01350" class="">redeem</st>—the <st data-num="04465" class="">sale</st> of a <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> which is his <st data-num="0272" class="">property</st> in a <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>—must <st data-num="03318" class="">revert</st> in the <st data-num="03104" class="">Jubilee</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">houses</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> of the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st> are their <st data-num="0272" class="">property</st> in the <st data-num="08432" class="">midst</st> of the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>.
Moreover, the open field areas of their cities must not be sold, because that is their perpetual possession.
“‘If your brother becomes impoverished and is indebted to you, you must support him; he must live with you like a foreign resident.

Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="05392" class="">interest</st> or <st data-num="08635" class="">profit</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">from</st> him,<n id="1" /> but you must <st data-num="03372" class="">fear</st> your <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, and your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> must <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">lend</st> him your <st data-num="03701" class="">money</st> at <st data-num="05392" class="">interest</st>, and you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">sell</st> him <st data-num="0400" class="">food</st> for <st data-num="04768" class="">profit</st>.<n id="1" />
I am the Lord your God who brought you out from the land of Egypt to give you the land of Canaan—to be your God.
“‘If your brother becomes impoverished with regard to you so that he sells himself to you, you must not subject him to slave service.

He must <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you as a <st data-num="07916" class="">hired worker</st>, as a <st data-num="08453" class="">resident foreigner</st>;<n id="1" /> he must <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="08141" class="">Year</st> of <st data-num="03104" class="">Jubilee</st>,

but then<n id="1" /> he may <st data-num="03318" class="">go free</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> and his <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> him, and may <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> and <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0272" class="">property</st> of his <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="03588" class="">Since</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">the Israelites</st><n id="1" /> are my <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> I <st data-num="03318" class="">brought out</st> from the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>, they must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="04376" class="">sold</st> in a <st data-num="05650" class="">slave</st> <st data-num="04466" class="">sale</st>.<n id="2" />
You must not rule over them harshly, but you must fear your God.
“‘As for your male and female slaves who may belong to you—you may buy male and female slaves from the nations all around you.

<st data-num="01571" class="">Also</st>, you may <st data-num="07069" class="">buy</st> slaves<n id="1" /> from the <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st> of the <st data-num="08453" class="">foreigners</st> who <st data-num="01481" class="">reside</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you and from their <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> are<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you, <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> they have <st data-num="03205" class="">fathered</st> in your <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>; they may <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> your <st data-num="0272" class="">property</st>.

You may give them as an inheritance to your children after you to possess as property. You may enslave them perpetually. However, as for your brothers the Israelites, no man may rule over his brother harshly.

“‘If a resident foreigner who is with you prospers and your brother becomes impoverished with regard to him so that he sells himself to a resident foreigner who is with you or to a member of a foreigner’s family,

<st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> he has <st data-num="04376" class="">sold</st> himself he <st data-num="01961" class="">retains</st> a <st data-num="01353" class="">right of redemption</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0259" class="">One</st> of his <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st> may <st data-num="01350" class="">redeem</st> him,

<st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> his <st data-num="01730" class="">uncle</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> his <st data-num="01121 01730">cousin</st><n id="1" /> may <st data-num="01350" class="">redeem</st> him, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="07607" class="">any one of the rest of his blood</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">relatives</st>—his <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st><n id="2" />—may <st data-num="01350" class="">redeem</st> him, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> if<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03027" class="">he</st> <st data-num="05381" class="">prospers</st>, he may <st data-num="01350" class="">redeem</st> himself.

He must <st data-num="02803" class="">calculate</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> the one who <st data-num="07069" class="">bought</st> him the number of years<n id="1" /> from the <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> he <st data-num="04376" class="">sold</st> himself to him <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="03104" class="">Jubilee</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st>, and the <st data-num="03701" class="">cost</st> of his <st data-num="04465" class="">sale</st> must <st data-num="01961" class="">correspond</st> to the <st data-num="04557" class="">number</st> of <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>, according to the <st data-num="03117" class="">rate of wages</st> a <st data-num="07916" class="">hired worker</st> would have <st data-num="01961" class="">earned</st> while <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> him.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> there are <st data-num="05750" class="">still</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>, <st data-num="06310">in keeping with</st> them,<n id="1" /> he must <st data-num="07725" class="">refund</st> most of the <st data-num="03701" class="">cost</st> of his <st data-num="04736" class="">purchase</st> for his <st data-num="01353" class="">redemption</st>,

but <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> only a <st data-num="04592" class="">few</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="07604" class="">remain</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="08141 03104">Jubilee</st>, he must <st data-num="02803" class="">calculate</st> for himself <st data-num="06310" class="">in keeping with</st> the remaining <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> and <st data-num="07725" class="">refund</st> it for his <st data-num="01353" class="">redemption</st>.

He must <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> the one who bought him<n id="1" /> like a <st data-num="08141 08141">yearly</st> <st data-num="07916" class="">hired worker</st>.<n id="2" /> The one who bought him<n id="3" /> must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07287">rule over</st> him <st data-num="06531" class="">harshly</st> in your <st data-num="05869" class="">sight</st>.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st>, however,<n id="1" /> he is <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01350" class="">redeemed</st> in <st data-num="0428" class="">these ways</st>, he must <st data-num="03318" class="">go free</st><n id="2" /> in the <st data-num="03104" class="">Jubilee</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> and his <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> him,
because the Israelites are my own servants; they are my servants whom I brought out from the land of Egypt. I am the Lord your God.
